file_path.title: File Path
file_path.description: Source file path with its extension or wildcard.

new_files_only.title: New Files Only
new_files_only.description: Every job stores the timestamp of the last downloaded file and a subsequent job can pick up from there.

custom_tag.title: Custom Tag (optional)
custom_tag.description: Adds custom tag to Keboola Storage for all downloaded files.

permanent.title: Permanent Files
permanent.description: If set to true, downloaded files will be stored as permanent in Keboola storage. Otherwise, they will be deleted after 14 days.
